duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing and managing the financial and operational facets of the community.
Preparing monthly close-out and financial reports.
Processing invoices for payment and collecting rent, fees, and other payments.
Completing bank deposits, dispositions, and account reconciliations.
Using property management software to record, track, and report on all financial workings of the community.
Managing daily transactions and tasks related to the financial operation of the community.
Operating property management software (Yardi/OneSite) and completing transactions accurately.
Reviewing resident files and accounting records to determine unpaid and/or late fees owed and implementing procedures for collecting on delinquencies.
Reviewing and submitting invoices from vendors, contractors, and service providers for payment.
Following company’s established procedures related to evictions and resident move-outs.
Promoting resident satisfaction and retention by responding to complaints, questions, and requests.
Acting as the on-site supervisor in the absence of the community manager.
Assisting in managing the client/owner relationship and providing updates and information about the community’s performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Accounting, or a related field.
